title: Add new content categories to the main page (Radio, DJs, IRL, Podcasts, PPV Events)

requirements.text: Extend the channel category system to support the following new categories end-to-end (creation/editing, storage, and retrieval): Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, and PPV Events.

quotes: add radio - djs - irl - audio & video podcast - PPV Events on main page

acceptanceCriteria: Backend accepts these new category values when creating/updating channels (in addition to existing categories).
Fetching channels returns the correct category value for channels in the new categories.
Existing categories (music/gaming/sports/horror/adult) continue to work without regression.

requirements.text: Update the main (home) page category browsing section to include clickable entries for Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, and PPV Events, alongside the existing categories.

quotes: add radio - djs - irl - audio & video podcast - PPV Events on main page

acceptanceCriteria: The home page “Browse Categories” section shows the 5 new categories with clear English labels.
Clicking each new category navigates to its category listing page (the existing /category/$categoryName route).

requirements.text: Update the Creator channel editor category dropdown to include Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, and PPV Events as selectable options, using clear English labels (e.g., "IRL", "DJs", "PPV Events", "Audio & Video Podcasts").

quotes: add radio - djs - irl - audio & video podcast - PPV Events on main page

acceptanceCriteria: A creator can select each new category in the channel editor.
Saving a channel with any new category succeeds and the saved channel displays that category on browse/detail pages.

requirements.text: Update category display naming so that category pages and UI badges show appropriate English capitalization for the new categories (e.g., "IRL" not "Irl", "DJs" not "Djs", "PPV Events" not "Ppv").

quotes: add radio - djs - irl - audio & video podcast - PPV Events on main page

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to each new category page shows a correctly formatted page title.
Stream detail pages display a correctly formatted category badge for channels in the new categories.

requirements.text: Add new static category icon assets for Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, and PPV Events, and render them via the existing CategoryIcon component mapping (served from frontend/public/assets/generated).

quotes: add radio - djs - irl - audio & video podcast - PPV Events on main page

acceptanceCriteria: Each new category shows a non-placeholder icon wherever CategoryIcon is used.
Icons are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated and do not require backend changes to serve images.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add migration logic only if required for an upgrade.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead.
Use English for all user-facing labels and text.
nonGoals: Adding new pages beyond the existing category listing route (/category/$categoryName).
Changing Adult content gating behavior (it should remain applied only for the Adult category).
Adding payment rails or PPV purchase/checkout logic for PPV Events (this request only adds the category for browsing and channel organization).

required: Audio & video podcasts category icon illustration (rockhog-cat-podcasts.dim_256x256.png)
